StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: eMERGE Network Imputed GWAS for 41 Phenotypes

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical
ConsentGroup.name: HMB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.
These data will be used only for health related research, including research to improve methods for health related research.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Dementia)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-DEM
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Dementia.
Use of the data must be related to health research on dementia or other adult conditions related to the aging process. This includes research to improve methods for conducting research that could be applied to dementia or other adult conditions related to the aging process. For example, studies of conditions like cataract, diabetes, and psoriasis might be appropriate, while conditions like attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and neuroblastoma might not be appropriate. Studies of conditions that are common in both children and the elderly, such as schizophrenia or depression, would not be appropriate if they focused on children or young adults. Studies focused primarily on pediatric populations are not permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical - Genetic Studies Only-No Insurance Companies
ConsentGroup.name: HM-B-GSO-NIC
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only. No permitted use: Insurance Companies

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.
Investigators must state in the Data Use Request their intention to publish or otherwise broadly share any findings from his or her study with the scientific community.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Childhood Diseases)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CHILDD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Childhood Diseases.
Approved use for studies of the genetic and environmental factors that contribute to childhood health, development and disease
